title: \"Uber wissenschaftliche Exzellenz und Wettbewerb. (arXiv:2310.09588v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: The pursuit of excellence seems to be the True North of academia. What is meant by excellence? Can excellence be measured? This article discusses the concept of excellence in the context of research and competition.
context:
Title: \"Uber wissenschaftliche Exzellenz und Wettbewerb. (arXiv:2310.09588v1 [econ.GN])
Abstract: The pursuit of excellence seems to be the True North of academia. What is meant by excellence? Can excellence be measured? This article discusses the concept of excellence in the context of research and competition.
translated_title: "关于科学卓越与竞争的论文"
translated_abstract: 追求卓越似乎是学术界的真正目标。卓越是什么意思？能否衡量卓越？本文讨论了在研究和竞争的背景下卓越的概念。
tldr: 本文讨论了科学研究和竞争背景下卓越的概念。
en_tdlr: This article discusses the concept of excellence in the context of scientific research and competition.
